title: Capstone Faculty
content: Any recommendations on teachers to do capstone project with? And does the designation of the teacher matter in terms of how other people see your project/paper?

comments.body: I hear she treats her her teams *very well*.
Choose teachers related to your project, not just for their reputation. They will be able to guide you better through the 2 semesters.
Bharthi Ma'am is the most chill capstone guide you can hope for.

It's finally you, your team and your project.
Not that much of an impact is made by the guide.
Hey I was looking for reviews on Dr sudeepa for my capstone project. Now that uve emphasized on the "very well" I'm a little confused. Is that sarcasm?

It is sarcasm. My friend was under sudeepa, and I don't know if this was pertaining to only her team, but sudeepa did not treat them well. She didn't offer any guidance and asked the team to figure it out. And when the team came back with results, they were told it was wrong. They did not enjoy having picked sudeepa as their capstone mentor. 

Again, I don't know it this was experienced by only my friends team or other teams as well.
